description: Table showing percentage of half days missed due to unauthorised absence, number of pupils of compulsory school age and number of pupil enrolments in maintained primary, state-funded secondary and special schools in each (i) local authority area and (ii) constituency, for the years 1999/00, 2000/01, 2003/04, 2007/08 and 2008/09.
department: Department for Children, Schools and Families
